project.description: This job is managed by JJB! Changes must be done in git This job will redeploy scenario-6a: - 7 nodes - HA with ipm (3 nodes) - Sharerd storage on a NFS server (uses qa-provided nfs shares) - 2 kvm compute nodes - 2 docker compute nodes It will wipe all machines!

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: hw_number
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Mandatory, name of the QA cloud server as integer

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: tempest
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Optional, specify what tempest test(s) to run, e.g. smoke, smoke|full or smoke|defcore

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: cct
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Optional, specify cct tests to run

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: ssl_type
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Mandatory, set the SSL configuration for the cloud, available options: no-ssl, ssl-insecure, ssl

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: cloud_version
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Mandatory, version of the cloud to be installed as integer

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: TESTHEAD
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: if non-empty, test latest version from Devel:Cloud Stagin

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: hacloud
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: By default we do not want HA configured and installed

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: clusterconfig
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: HA configuration for clusters. Make sense only if hacloud=1

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: nodenumber
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Number of nodes to use. Depends on hw_number

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: runner_url
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The runner must be qa_crowbarsetup.sh file

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: commands
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: All the steps that needs to be completed to have cloud installed
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.defaultValue: prepareinstallcrowbar installcrowbar allocate waitcloud setup_aliases batch

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash admin=crowbar$hw_number cloud=qa$hw_number
if [ ! -z "$UPDATEREPOS" ] ; then # testing update only makes sense with GMx and without TESTHEAD unset TESTHEAD export UPDATEREPOS=${UPDATEREPOS//$'\n'/+} fi
export artifacts_dir=$WORKSPACE/.artifacts rm -rf $artifacts_dir mkdir -p $artifacts_dir touch $artifacts_dir/.ignore freshadminvm_cloud6 $admin qcow2 sleep 100 # time for the admin VM to boot
# wipe out shared NFS that should be used by this deployment ssh root@localhost "wipe_nfs_shares qa$hw_number"
# rest of code runs on admin node: env | grep -e networking -e libvirt -e cloud > mkcloud.config scp mkcloud.config root@$admin: ret=0
ssh root@$admin " export cloud=$cloud ; export hw_number=$hw_number ; export UPDATEREPOS=$UPDATEREPOS ; export UPDATEBEFOREINSTALL=$UPDATEBEFOREINSTALL ; export TESTHEAD=$TESTHEAD ; export cloudsource=$cloudsource ; export nodenumber=$nodenumber ; export hacloud=$hacloud ; export clusterconfig=$clusterconfig ; export want_docker=1 ; export runner_url=$runner_url ; export scenario_url=$scenario_url ; export want_node_aliases=controller=3,kvm=2,docker=2 export want_node_roles=controller=3,compute=4 export scenario=/root/scenario.yml; export commands=\"$commands\" "'
wget --no-check-certificate -Oqa_crowbarsetup.sh "$runner_url" wget --no-check-certificate -Oscenario.yml "$scenario_url"
sed -i -e "s,##shared_nfs_for_database##,10.162.24.1:/var/$cloud/ha-database," scenario.yml sed -i -e "s,##shared_nfs_for_rabbitmq##,10.162.24.1:/var/$cloud/ha-rabbitmq," scenario.yml sed -i -e "s,##shared_nfs_for_glance##,10.162.24.1:/var/$cloud/ha-glance," scenario.yml
[ $UPDATEBEFOREINSTALL == "true" ] && export updatesteps="addupdaterepo runupdate"
timeout --signal=ALRM 240m bash -x -c ". qa_crowbarsetup.sh ; onadmin_runlist $commands" ' || ret=$?
if [ $ret != 0 ] ; then ssh root@$admin ' set -x for node in $(crowbar machines list | grep ^d) ; do ( echo "Collecting supportconfig from $node" timeout 400 ssh $node supportconfig | wc timeout 300 scp $node:/var/log/\*tbz /var/log/ )& done timeout 500 supportconfig | wc & wait '
scp root@$admin:/var/log/*tbz $artifacts_dir/ fi >&2
echo "mkphyscloud ret=$ret" exit $ret

hudson.plugins.parameterizedtrigger.Pred.properties: hw_number=$hw_number tempest=$tempest cct_tests=$cct scenario_name=6a scenario_job_name=$JOB_NAME scenario_build_number=$BUILD_NUMBER
